body: Currently payloads do not have associated metadata. It is needed to various tools. For example payload can be serialized, zipped and encrypted protobuf. So metadata would need to specify compression and encryption algorithm as well as proto file name and version.

comments.body: This is how to do it with gRPC: https://github.com/grpc/grpc-go/blob/master/Documentation/grpc-metadata.md
This is not going to work for decisions for example as each decision potentially can use different encoding.
Sorry, gRPC metadata is completely different thing.
